Name: Stefania Coppi/Stefania Goblets
Description:
Stefania was violently beaten and her skull smashed in. 

> On August 1st, 2007, Transgender woman Stefania Coppi, 35, was found in a pool of blood in her Rome apartment, with her skull smashed in. The police of Rome arrested an Italian man named Domenico Broscella, 35, for the crime, and are looking for a second suspect, a non-EU resident who may possibly be Serbian.

Name: Maribelle Reyes
Description: Maribelle died from AIDS after being turned away from several treatment centers due to her transgender status.
